title: ndeimler99/pombeTARPON
description: A pipeline to Analyze Pombe Specific Telomeric sequences from Nanopore Sequencing

Input_Options.title: Input Parameters
Input_Options.description: Mandatory Parameters to set up the Analysis

input.title: Input File
input.description: Sequencing Files - Either a file directory or a single file - BAM, fastq, or fastq.gz accepted

run_name.title: Run Name
run_name.description: Title of Sequencing Run for Generation of Output Files

sample_name.title: Sample Name
sample_name.description: Name of sample when sequencing contains only one sample

Demux_Options.title: Demultiplexing Parameters
Demux_Options.description: Mandatory Parameters to set up the Analysis

sample_file.title: Sample File
sample_file.description: CSV file containing sample names and barcodes to use for demultiplexing. If no adaptor sequence is provided the barcodes will also be used for determing the end of the telomere

barcode_errors.title: Allowed Errors in Barcode Sequences
barcode_errors.description: Number of allowed errors in the barcode sequence. It is recomended this value by 1/8 the length of the barcode assuming the hamming distance between barcodes is greater than 1/8 the barcode length

capture_probe_sequence.title: Telomere Capture Sequence
capture_probe_sequence.description: Provide the first 12 nucleotides of the capture sequence that would appear on the G strand telomeric sequences

capture_probe_sequence_errors.title: Allowed Errors in Adaptor Sequence
capture_probe_sequence_errors.description: Number of allowed errors to be found in the capture probe sequence. It is recomended this value be 2 for a 12 nucleotide adaptor sequence. For each additional 8bp, the number of errors should be increased by 1

Reference_files.title: Reference Files
Reference_files.description: Mandatory Parameters to set up the Analysis

Output_Options.title: Output Parameters
Output_Options.description: Mandatory Parameters to set up the Analysis

outdir.title: Output Directory
outdir.description: This should be a path to a directory to store the output data. The parent directory should exist. If the main directory does not exist it will be created

overwrite_outdir.title: Overwrite Output Directory?
overwrite_outdir.description: Set this to true if the output directory already exists but you would like to overwrite the data

Advanced_Telomere_Parameters.title: Advanced Parameters for Telomere Isolation and Identification
Advanced_Telomere_Parameters.description: Advanced Parameters for Telomere Isolation and Identification

repeat_count.title: Number of Repeats
repeat_count.description: Number of Repeats in last read_fragmet_length bp of sequence for read to be identified as telomeric

read_fragment_length.title: Read Subset Length
read_fragment_length.description: Distance from end of read to the end of the read to search for telomeric repeats

minimum_strand_percentage.title: Minimum Strand Percentage
minimum_strand_percentage.description: % of G strand repeats to be classified as G vs C strand.  Reads between this value and (1-this value) will be excluded from analysis

canonical_start.title: Canonical Sequence Start
canonical_start.description: Sequence used to identify the start of telomeric sequences

canonical_start_errors.title: Canonical Start Sequence Errors
canonical_start_errors.description: Number of Errors allowed in canonical start sequence used to identify telomere start

telo_start_repeat_count.title: Telomere Start Repeat Count
telo_start_repeat_count.description: Number of Consecutive Telomeric Repeats to use to identify the start of the telomere if canonical start is not found

telo_start_error_count.title: Telomere Start Error Count
telo_start_error_count.description: Number of errors allowed in telomere start repeat count when searching for start of telomere

telo_end_repeat_count.title: Telomere End Repeat Count
telo_end_repeat_count.description: Number of consecutive telomeric repeats used to identify the end of the telomere sequence

telo_end_error_count.title: Telomere End Error Count
telo_end_error_count.desciption: Number of errors allowed while searching for the last telo end repeat count repeats

Cluster_and_Blast.title: Cluster and Blast Paramater
Cluster_and_Blast.description: Advanced Parameters relating to the clustering of telomeric sequences

TAS1_TAS3_percent_identity.title: TAS1/3 Percent Identity
TAS1_TAS3_percent_identity.description: Percent Identity of TAS1 and TAS3 elements via blast to include in cluster plot

TAS2_percent_identity.title: TAS2 Percent Identity
TAS2_percent_identity.description: Percent Identity of TAS2 elements via blast to include in cluster plot

TAS_length_fraction.title: TAS Length Fraction
TAS_length_fraction.description: Length of blast hit must exceed this fraction times the length of the TAS element to be plotted in cluster plot

cluster_telo_length.title: Cluster Read Length
cluster_telo_length.description: Minimum subtelomeric read length required for read to be included in clustering analysis

cluster_similarity_threshold.title: Cluster Similarity Threshold
cluster_similarity_threshold.description: Similarity threshold to be used while running meshclust

cluster_plot_width.title: Clustering Plot Nucleotides
cluster_plot_width.description: Number of Subtelomeric Nucleotides to plot

image_width_px.title: Image Width
image_width_px.description: Clustering plot image width in pixels

image_height_px.title: Image Height
image_height_px.description: Clustering plot image height in pixels

minimum_cluster_size.title: Minimum Cluster Size
minimum_cluster_size.description: Minimum number of reads in cluster to be included in clustering plots and consensus analysis

consensus.title: Perform Consensus Analysis
consensus.description: If set to true a consensus sequence will be determined for each cluster and plotted. This will increase computational time substantially

alignment_percentage.title: Percentage of Alignments
alignment_percentage.description: The proportion of reads within a cluster that must contain a common nucleotide for the consensus sequence to be determined
